data.content:
If you have received a damaged/defective/dead product, you can get a replacement within 14 days of delivery. Please make sure that the original packaging is not tampered with otherwise exchange/ refund cannot be processed. Package once open cannot be refunded.

All refunds will be credited in your Wallet as store credits which you can use to shop on our website. In case of manufacturing defect we will facilitate the exchange/return, however the shipping charges to and fro to the vendor may apply.

data.productName: Little Birdie Water Brush Pen Flat Broad
data.sub_title: Water Colour Brush Pens are available in three different sizes - fine, medium and broad. Whether you are a beginner or a pro at watercolour painting, this brush pen will prove to be your best buddy. Its just like any other brush, but is mess-free and trouble-free to travel with. Great for colouring stencil patterns, watercolour painting, brush lettering and travel painting.

data.sub_title: Dries to a semi-matte finish Good coverage and a creamy texture Fast drying time allows you to layer paint quickly without muddying your colours Suitable for most surfaces including canvas, wood, air-dried clay, plaster, cardboard, paper, leather and some plastics Available in a range of colours Colours: Multiple Shades of Yellow, Orange, Red, Pink, Blue, Green, Purple, Brown, Black & White

data.productName: Plastic Palette
data.sub_title: Kids love colouring! When its time to introduce them to watercolour, an accompanying palette is a must. Itsy Bitsy offers this cute frog shape mini plastic palette for budding artists. Its easy to carry and clean and is designed with different shape wells to accommodate several colours at one go!. Suitable for use with watercolour paints. Perfect for gifting kids or use as a return gift for birthday parties and other kid's events.

data.caption:
Let's paint a simple yet amazing watercolor sunset using Little Birdie Watercolor Inks! Have you tried them yet? Let us know your thoughts in the comments below! 
.
 Save the post for later and TAG someone who would find it useful! 

 GRATITUDE SALE is LIVE!! Upto 80% OFF! Visit our website www.itsybitsy.in to shop now! 
.
Materials Required- Little Birdie Watercolor Inks (Newly launched, available at flat 20% off! - shades used- Lemon, Rosy Mist, Grape, Orange) Watercolor paper 100% cotton cold press, Synthetic hair brushes, jar of water, Palette, washi tape.
.
Step 1 - Tape down the watercolor paper with washi tape and apply a light wash of water till 3/4 area as shown in the video. 

Step 2 - Starting with the lighter shade Yellow, apply using a round brush over the wet paper.
Gently blend in a little bit of orange as well. 

Step 3 - Slowly add in darker orange and pink to the sky and blend in with yellow. Leave a circle in the center for the sun as shown. 

Step 4 - For the sky, let's add darker pink and violet.
Leave it to dry. 

Step 5 - For the layered mountains, start with dark orange, paint mountains using a smaller size round brush. Wait till it's completely dry before painting the next layer.
Repeat 3 or 4 times, let it dry completely.
Done!! Peel off the washi tape carefully.
.
#madewithitsybitsy 

.
.

.
.

.
.
#itsybitsycraftstore #littlebirdiecrafts 
#artandcraftideas #diyvideos #watercolorvideos #watercolortutorial #watercolourartwork #watercolortechniques #watercolortutorials #watercolorsunset #sunsetpaintings #sunsetpainting #watercolorsunsetart #watercolourvideo #watercolorinks #liquidwatercolors #watercolorskies #sunsetinspired #layeredmountains 
#artvideos #watercolorink #diywatercolor #watercolorforbeginners

data.caption:
Here are 5 fun ways to decorate Paper Mache letters! They'd make a great home decor and perfect for gifts! Which one is your favorite? Have you tried any of them?
Let us know in the comments! 
.
 Save the post for later and TAG someone who would find it useful! 

 GRATITUDE SALE is LIVE!! Upto 80% OFF! Visit our website www.itsybitsy.in to shop now! 
.
Materials Required- Newly launched Paper Mache Letters, (available in 2 sizes) Multi-surface paints, chalk paints, Handmade flowers, Deco Transfer Sheets, Decor varnish, silicone glue, stencils, Grainy texture paste, Sculpture paste, Palette knife, synthetic hair brushes, gilding glue, Imitation gold leaf.
.
Step 1 - Paint all the letters with chalk or Multi-surface paints and let it dry. 

1st - Using silicone glue, adhere some handmade flowers. 

2nd - Fussy cut your favorite Deco transfer sheet, remove the transparent sheet and pace it upside down. Gently press down to cover the entire area.
Now, using a sponge, apply a little bit of water over the surface by gently tapping.
Carefully remove the white sheet.
Let it dry, and apply a coat of Decor varnish to seal it! 

3rd - Apply Gilding glue and let it sit for 15 - 20 mins (till the glue turns clear). Carefully add the imitation/gilding leaf over the letter and gently press down.
Let it sit for a couple of minutes. Now brush off the excess using any dry synthetic hair brush. 

4th - Using any stencil and grainy texture paste (you can use mixed media paste, sparkle paste etc) Apply it over the letter and remove the stencil carefully. Leave it to dry completely. 

5th - Take Sculpture paste and using palette knife apply on the front side of the letter. Let it dry. 

Done!!
.
#madewithitsybitsy 

.
.

.
.

.
.

200K!!  A massivee thank you to each and everyone one of you for the love & support! 
In celebration of 200k fam here on Instagram, we are GIVING AWAY Rs.50000 worth Gift vouchers!!
.
200 people will win a voucher of Rs.250 each.
Well select 10 winners everyday for 20 days!!
.
Our Founders, Rashmi & Harish will be answering some of your questions in a couple of days, so rush to the stories to ask them all!! 

Aren't you Excited!? 
Follow the rules below for a chance to win!
.
 RULES  - 
1. Follow us, Like & Save this post!
2. Go to our profile and turn on notifications for our posts and stories so you don't miss any of our DIYs & GIVEAWAYS
(The little bell on top right corner) 
3.Tag 3 or more friends in the comments (one per comment)
Each comment counts as one entry, so tag as many as you can! (more the better)
4. Share this post on your stories and tag us @itsybitsycraftstore and use hashtag #itsybitsy200kgiveaway
5. Comment 'Done' once you finish all the steps! 

Giveaway closes on 20th June 2021.
 
 IMPORTANT  - 
* If it's a private account, send us a screenshot via DM.
* No giveaway accounts accepted. 
* The gift voucher is unconditional, there is no minimum purchase required. 
* Valid till 15 days from the date of issue!
(Redeemable Only ONLINE)

** Winners will be announced every day (10 winners each day) from June 23rd to July 12th 2021).
* Selected randomly* 

 Open to Indian residents only. 

 Winners must respond within 24 hours to claim the Prize.
.
.
This giveaway is not sponsored by Instagram
.

.
.
.

.
.
.
.

data.caption:
It's timee!!  Applications for our  Brand Ambassador  2021- 2022 are OPEN!! We are looking for creative and passionate artists ready to explore, willing to learn and help us in promoting our products! 
(For Instagram & Facebook) 

 THE APPLICATION PROCESS-

If you are interested in joining our creative team, share your creations using the hashtag #itsybitsyBAcall2021 (NEW ENTRIES)
 Kindly read all the terms & fill the Google form linked in our bio to be eligible. (Mandatory)
 Submit your entries by June 25th 2021 (NEW ENTRIES ONLY) on your page with hashtag #itsybitsyBAcall2021 
 You can share as many entries as you like before the last date!
 It's not compulsory to use Itsy Bitsy products, however it's much appreciated! 
 Make sure your projects are related to the topic you are applying for!
 Kindly mention the Category name in the caption - Example For 'Watercolor Artist' category.
 Check our blog link for more information about BA call, FAQs, eligibility, benefits, etc  before applying!
 Your profile needs to be public to be Eligible.

 IMPORTANT: 

 You'll receive an attractive starter kit (according to the category)
 It will be a six months contract starting from August 1st 2021.
 You must be active on Instagram/Facebook
with noticeable presence/followers. 

We are super excited to see all your wonderful entries! 
.
.

.
.

.
.

.
.
.

data.caption:
Create this wonderful piece of homedecor and enhance the beauty of your wall! 
It's easy and quick to make! Are you trying it? Let us know in the comments below! 
.
 Save the post for later and TAG someone who would find it useful!

 GRATITUDE SALE is LIVE!! Upto 80% OFF! Visit our website www.itsybitsy.in to shop now! 

Project by @art_paradise_07
.
Materials Required : Rectangular MDF plank, watercolor 'Welcome' sign, watercolor flowers , color splash , silicone glue ,stencil, pallette knife, flat brush, gesso, Mixed Media Paste.
.
Step 1 : using mixed media paste and stencil give desired texture on the MDF plank .
Step 2 : Then give a coat of white gesso all over it.
Step 3 : Spray color splash to create a colorful background.
Step 4 : Colour the watercolor flowers using any 2 shades of color splash.
Step 5 : Adhere the flowers and the wording on the plank with silicon glue.
Done!
A quick and a vibrant Decor piece is ready to hang on your wall!
.
.
#madewithitsybitsy #itsybitsycraftstore 
.
.
.

.
.
.
.

.
.

data.name: Image

data.caption:
Today let's upcycle these little plastic planters with mixed media! These will be perfect as  dcor for your  home or even working desk! How do you like them? Share your views in the comments! 
.
 Save the post for later and TAG someone who would find it useful!
.
 GRATITUDE SALE is LIVE!! Upto 80% OFF! Visit our website www.itsybitsy.in to shop now! 
.
Project by @the_elysian_crafts

Materials required: Silicone mould,  Shape it epoxy, White gesso, Heavy gel medium, chalk paints, tinted metalic paint, Dcor varnish.

Step 1:Take equal amount of Shape It resin and Shape It hardener.Mix both well by rolling between the palms or kneading until a uniform colour is achieved. Press it into the mould.

Step 2: After few minutes remove the shape from the mould and place it on the surface you want to use it and let it dry.

Step 3: once it is dry adhere it with  heavy gel medium and apply a coat of white gesso covering the entire surface.

Step 4: Once the gesso is dry, color them with chalk paint of your choice. Here we have used lavender blush and misty rose.

Step 5:  Add some metallic accents with gold tinted metallic paint. Seal it with a coat of decor varnish.

Done !  A tiny Mixed media planter is ready.
.
.
#madewithitsybitsy #itsybitsycraftstore 

.
.

.
.

.
.

.

data.caption:
Easy Alcohol ink backgrounds! Have you tried Little Birdie Alcohol Inks? Create interesting and gorgeous patterns with them in no time! Follow this video to start creating! 
.
 Save the post for later and TAG someone who would find it useful!

 GRATITUDE SALE is LIVE!! Upto 80% OFF! Visit our website www.itsybitsy.in to shop now! 
.
Project by @tints.and.inks 
.
Materials required: Alcohol inks,  yupo paper, blending solution, hairdryer. 

 Add alcohol inks and blending solution on yupo paper.
 Use a hairdryer to create patterns 

Points to remember: 
1. Alcohol inks dry in 5 to 10 seconds 
2. Add blending solution to reactivate the inks.

Safety precautions:
1. Wear a respirator/ mask while working with alcohol inks especially if you are working on larger pieces. Work in a well ventilated room
2. Wear gloves to prevent staining on hands.
.
.

data.productName: Little Birdie Share Pack Gesso - White, 50ml, 6pc
data.sub_title: A convenient pack of 6pc X 50ml, Gesso White that are easy to carry and convenient to share during workshops, school projects, craft parties and more. Premium gesso for preparing painting surfaces (foundation) for acrylic and oil paints, mixed media , decoupage etc. Water based opaque primer. Dries to a water-resistant surface and flexible when dry. When dry, creates an absorbent surface to paint on. Completely matte on drying. Best applied with palette knife, foam roller, flat brush. Can be used on canvas, cardboard, paper and wood, glass and more. Best for priming metal embellishments, chipboards, resin, etc on mixed media projects.

data.productName: Little Birdie Share Pack Acrylic Heavy Gel - Glossy, 20ml, 6pc
data.sub_title: A convenient pack of 6pc X 20ml, Acrylic Heavy Gel Glossy that are easy to carry and convenient to share during workshops, school projects, craft parties and more. Transparent, flexible, extra heavy body acrylic gel medium with a glossy finish. Extends volume, viscosity and density of acrylic paints along with increasing brilliance and transparency. Keeps paints workable for longer. Can be mixed with paints, pigments and inks. Works as a binder for powder pigments. Suitable for creating dimensional textures holding high peaks. Best for adhereing Heavy metal embellishments or Dimentional flowers onto mixed media projects. Dries clear.

data.productName: Little Birdie Share Pack Crackle Paste - 20gram, 6pc
data.sub_title: A convenient pack of 6pc X 20ml, Crackle Paste that are easy to carry and convenient to share during workshops, school projects, craft parties and more. This thick white paste helps create dimensional, fissure like crackled pattern on air drying. Size of cracks depend upon thickness of application. Suitable for freehand use or with stencils. Can be used on a variety of surfaces like wood, canvas, chipboard, paper and more. Tintable and paintable with a permanent finish Ideal for applying with palette knife. Water-based. Make sure to clean your tools with soap and water before paste dries. Do not force dry the paste as it may interfere with the quality of crackling. Widely used for mixed media, decoupage and Art Journalling.

data.productName: Little Birdie Share Pack 2 in 1 Modelling Paste - White, 20gram, 6pc
data.sub_title: A convenient pack of 6pc X 20ml, 2 in 1 Modelling Paste that are easy to carry and convenient to share during workshops, school projects, craft parties and more. Little Birdie Mixed Media Paste is a combination of both Gesso and Modelling Paste. It is great for preparing various surfaces like wood, MDF, metal, chipboard and more. This heavy bodied paste can be used as a modelling paste or a thinner gesso like consistency can be achieved by mixing water. It is can be easily spread with palette knives or stiff brushes. It adheres to most surfaces and is made with a non-toxic, acid free formula The cracks have to be highlighted with metallic wax of desired colour. Great for creating smooth as well as highly textured patterns! Clean up with water

data.productName: Tim Holtz Distress Collage Medium Matte, 2oz
data.sub_title: Tim Holtz Distress Collage Medium is a matte gel medium ideal for gluing, layering, and sealing mixed-media projects. Apply directly on porous or non-porous surfaces including paper, chipboard, wood, fabric, glass, metal and plastic. The applicator tip bottle is designed for applying to smaller elements. Drying time will vary depending on amount applied. Dries translucent with a matte finish. Available in 2 oz bottle.

data.productName: Winsor & Newton White Gesso 225ml Jar
data.sub_title: A gesso with a superior level of pigmentation giving maximum covering power. Creates an ideal surface to paint on offering excellent tooth and a balanced absorbency.

data.productName: Winsor & Newton Iridescent Water Colour- Medium 75ml
data.sub_title: This medium gives pearlescent or glitter effects to watercolours and is particularly effective when mixed with transparent colours especially over dark backgrounds.Mix with transparent watercolour or apply over a dried wash. Shake well before use.

data.productName: Winsor & Newton Gum Arabic Water Colour- Medium 75ml
data.sub_title: A pale coloured solution that controls the spread of wet colour, reduces staining & slows drying.Also increases gloss & transparency. Dilute with water as required.

data.productName: Winsor & Newton Galeria Structure Gel 500ml Jar
data.sub_title: Add to acrylic colour to create high peak retention. Smooth and flexible. Provides a gloss finish with good clarity.

data.productName: Winsor & Newton Galeria Structure Gel 250ml Jar
data.sub_title: Add to acrylic colour to create high peak retention. Smooth and flexible. Provides a gloss finish with good clarity.

data.productName: Little Birdie Epoxy Art Resin & Hardener- 500ml + 250ml, Transparent, 1pc
data.sub_title: Odour & fume free. Auto bubble release Self-levelling resin Non-yellowing Mixes well with Little Birdie Resin colour / pigments Long shelf life Water & stain resistant No pot life: 45 minutes Full internal cure: 48 hours Touch dry: 12 hours Cure to handle: 10 hours Overcoat time: after full curing How to use art resin: Mix Resin and Hardener in the ratio 2:1 by volume preferably in paper/silicone cup with a wooden stirrer. Stir the mixture well for about 3 minutes. Let it sit for 1 minute for bubbles to release. Place the base on a levelled surface & pour the resin over your work. Bubbles if any, will start rising to the surface & will pop on their own. If not, use a hot air gun over the un-popped bubbles. The Resin needs to sit in a dust-free space while it cures. Within 24 to 48 hours fully cured (Curing time depends on weather conditions) If required, apply 2nd coat only after the resin is fully cured.

data.productName: Little Birdie Epoxy Art Resin & Hardener- 250ml + 125ml, Transparent, 1pc
data.sub_title: Odour & fume free. Auto bubble release Self-levelling resin Non-yellowing Mixes well with Little Birdie Resin colour / pigments Long shelf life Water & stain resistant No pot life: 45 minutes Full internal cure: 48 hours Touch dry: 12 hours Cure to handle: 10 hours Overcoat time: after full curing How to use art resin: Mix Resin and Hardener in the ratio 2:1 by volume preferably in paper/silicone cup with a wooden stirrer. Stir the mixture well for about 3 minutes. Let it sit for 1 minute for bubbles to release. Place the base on a levelled surface & pour the resin over your work. Bubbles if any, will start rising to the surface & will pop on their own. If not, use a hot air gun over the un-popped bubbles. The Resin needs to sit in a dust-free space while it cures. Within 24 to 48 hours fully cured (Curing time depends on weather conditions) If required, apply 2nd coat only after the resin is fully cured.

Adjustable heights makes it convenient to use for all. Ideal for schools, office, kid's room, tuition classes, workshops, shops and more. Easy to assemble and foldable. Convenient to store. Designed with a convenient removable tray for storing, writing, wiping and other accessories. Stand adjustable height 33.3inch

It is ideal for sticking most craft accessories like crystals, craft sticks, buttons, sequins, ribbons, glitter, papers and general craft supplies. Dries clear and quick.

data.sub_title: A kit for the stationery organizer Assortment of 7 pcs: 2 ball pens, 1 ice text liner, 1 glue stick, 1 correction pen, 1 bold permanent marker, 1 fine permanent marker Perfect as a joining kit
